title: The role of evidence in alternative medicine: Contrasting bi
author: Barry; Christine Ann
description: The growth of alternative medicine and its insurgence into the realms of the biomedical system raises a number of questions about the nature of evidence. Calls for 'gold standard' randomised controlle
